author: Special Correspondent
text:
A sessions court here on Tuesday sentenced a 35-year-old man, a former government servant, to 10 years’ rigorous imprisonment, holding him guilty for the murder of his wife and dowry harassment.

The prosecution’s case was that Raja alias Prakash Muthirapalayam along with his mother Anandhanayagi subjected his wife Ilamathy to cruelty and harassment to meet their unlawful demand of further dowry.

Strangulation

As Ilamathy was not able to meet their unlawful demand, her husband and her mother-in-law had strangulated her and made her to hang, creating an impression of suicide, and thereby caused the death on September 29, 2010.
title: 10 years RI for man
